intro.title: Introduction
intro.subTitle: A little more about me
intro.description:
Front-end and mobile developer, computer scientist, I have been in contact with software development for 10 years. I am a person who always tries to be up to date and learning new technologies and methodologies to always solve the problems in the best way possible.

I have dual citizenship, both being Brazilian and German.

Technologies and Methodologies:
- Typescript and Javascript
- Git (GitFlow, Sourcetree)
- APIs (Rest and SOAP)
- Scrum
- DevOps
- Microservice

Front:
- React (Redux, Context API, Styled Components)
- VueJS (Vuex)
- Angular (Angular Material, PWA, Plotly)
- SASS / CSS
- Bootstrap

Mobile:
- React Native (Redux, Context API, Styled Components)
- Ionic

I have experience in large projects and companies such as Samsung and Bosch.

GitHub: https://github.com/alissonph

items.description:
RecargaPay is the leading mobile payment wallet in Brazil. A fintech (450+ employees) whose the mission is democratize mobile payments and financial services. Here I work developing new features and bug fixes for the mobile app using React Native.

Main technologies:
- React Native (Redux)
- Git (Github, SourceTree)

Stefanini is a brazilian multinational software consulting (25000+ employees). Detran is the Department of Motor Vehicles (DMV) in Brazil. I worked developing the Detran application (Brasília - DF - Brazil). I redesigned the entire app based on the prototype made by the UI/UX team (Adobe XD) and developed new features. I also participated publishing the new app version on Google Play (Android) and App Store (iOS).

Main technologies:
- React Native (Context API, Stylesheet)
- Git (GitFlow, SourceTree)

Icaro Tech works in the Digital Transformation of companies through Automation, with a focus on Operational Efficiency and User Experience (200+ employees). Bosch is a German multinational engineering and electronics company. I worked on the Bosch project, developing a new web application called Fleet management, I was responsible for the all the front-end development in Angular during some months. I started working on the project that was in progress, we finished it and released a production version.

Main technologies:
- Angular 8 (Angular Material, Plotly, SASS, PWA, API Rest, Observable)
- Git (GitFlow, SourceTree)
- Azure (Kubernates, Docker)
- Jira
- Java (Spring Boot, Hibernate)
- Scrum

TOTVS is the largest technology company in Brazil, works with management software, productivity and collaboration platforms and consulting. I worked developing new features for Protheus software, and developing web applications. I worked on over 15 different clients, the biggest one being Samsung. I also conducted technical training, teaching how to develop a web app, and was responsible for good coding practices, structure and organization in the Git/SVN repository in some projects.

Main technologies:
- Angular, HMTL, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery and Bootstrap
- Protheus: ADVPL (proprietary language)
- SQL Server
- Git and SVN
- Rest and SOAP APIs
